text: (Vony zaznaly osudu) dlya toho, shchob porushuvaty yikhnyu domovlenist聞, vidkhylennya BOZHYKH vidkryttiv, ubyvayuchy prorokiv nespravedlyvo, ta dlya toho, shchob kazaty, "Nashi rozum skladayut聞sya!" Faktychno, BOH yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto opechatav yikhni rozum, zavdyaky yikhn聞omu disbelief, ta tse chomu vony ne spromozhut聞sya shchob poviryty, krim ridko
